summary: The term, innovate, captures the essence of creating groundbreaking ideas and structures across various fields. It involves developing new conceptual models, skills, and tools to address contemporary challenges. From decentralized organizations to pioneering practices in diverse fields, innovation drives progress and resilience in a rapidly changing world. The resources under this theme explore the intersection of different domains to foster original thinking and practical applications.
excerpt: The term ecosystem has evolved from biological roots to describe innovative, non-hierarchical structures in contemporary organizations, necessitating new conceptual models and tools.
